document_data.name: Saddle of the Plains
document_data.mainbody: The '''Saddle of the Plains''' was a quality inn located in the city of [[Lheshayl]] on the [[Shining Plains]].
document_data.Services: The Saddle of the Plains offered typical guest services of food and lodgings. Along with the [[Bit & Bridle]], the Saddle of the Plains was considered a moderately priced establishment.
document_data.History: At some point before the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, [[Adamar Session]], [[Bard]] of [[Starmantle]], visited the Saddle of the Plains inn during his twelve-year adventuring trek across the Reach. The establishment was also noted in the bard's guide to the [[Vilhon Reach]].
